title: Dwarven Forge Master
description: Born in the heart of the mountains, you have spent your life mastering the craft of the forge. The anvil and hammer are as familiar to you as breathing.

title: Tunnel Scout
description: You were trained in the deep tunnels to protect your kin from invaders. Your keen senses and agility are unmatched underground.

title: Elven Wanderer
description: An elf of the old world, you have traveled far and wide, never settling, always seeking the next adventure. The forests and wilds are your home.

title: Arcane Scholar
description: Raised among the high elves, you have dedicated your life to the study of ancient magic and the pursuit of arcane knowledge.

title: Street Enforcer
description: Raised in the industrial slums, you’ve spent your life brawling in back alleys and enforcing the rules of the underworld.

title: Factory Foreman
description: You rose through the ranks in the harsh industrial factories, gaining a keen understanding of machinery and labor.

title: Noble Scion
description: Born into a family of high status, you have been groomed for leadership and diplomacy, wielding influence wherever you go.

title: Mercenary Veteran
description: You’ve fought in countless battles, selling your skills to the highest bidder. Experience has hardened you into a formidable warrior.
